name: Add Google Sheets rows for new Order Desk manually created orders
description: Every time a new order is created manually in your Order Desk, Make will automatically add a Google Sheets row. Here's the [sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1V1WL0c7L5iAznlSRshkxRXHz13g8hiH0ux7zGyPSLsc/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario.
